content.rendered: At Money Vikings we have talked a lot over the years about macro investing themes and the power they can bring to a portfolio and wealth building. These are those huge trends over the globe that really cannot be stopped. Aging populations, adoption of technologies, healthcare, pharma, climate disruptions all offer certain investment opportunities. We are doubling down on cybersecurity, especially given recent world events. The democratized free world is swiftly responding to unprovoked physical violence on another sovereign nation. The pressure will simply continue and more and more warfare will play out on the cyber realm. Cybersecurity is a must have exposure in my investing playbook. My go to is $CIBR (First Trust Nasdaq Cybersecurity ETF). There are others and of course, individual strong names like Crowdstrike. The sector boasts a projected 28% year over year growth rate.
